com.google.wave.api
Interface GadgetView

All Known Implementing Classes:
GadgetViewImpl
public interface GadgetView

The GadgetView is a view of a document that simplifies management of gadgets and gadget state. All modifications to a document via the GadgetView generate operations. These operations are transmitted back to the Wave Robot Proxy and applied just as operations generated in a client would be.

Author:
scovitz@google.com (Seth Covitz), mprasetya@google.com (Marcel Prasetya)

Method Detail

append

void append(Gadget gadget)
Appends the given gadget to the end of the document.

Parameters:
gadget - The gadget to be appended.

delete

void delete(Gadget gadget)
Deletes the gadget matching the one specified. If it is not found in the document, then this method has no effect.

Parameters:
gadget - The gadget to be deleted.

delete

void delete(java.lang.String url)
Searches the document for a gadget matching the given url. If found, it is deleted, otherwise this method has no effect.

Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be deleted.

getGadget

Gadget getGadget(java.lang.String url)
Returns the gadget matching the specified url. If no gadget is found, null is returned.

Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be matched.
Returns:
the gadget if found, null otherwise.

getGadgets

java.util.List<Gadget> getGadgets()
Returns all gadgets found in the document.

Returns:
the list of gadgets.

insertAfter

void insertAfter(Gadget after,
                 Gadget gadget)
Inserts a new gadget immediately after the given gadget's position in the document. If the 'after' gadget is not found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
after - the gadget after which the new gadget is to be inserted.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

insertAfter

void insertAfter(java.lang.String url,
                 Gadget gadget)
Inserts a new gadget immediately after the gadget with the given url. If a gadget with the url is not found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be found.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

insertBefore

void insertBefore(Gadget before,
                  Gadget gadget)
Inserts a new gadget immediately before the given gadget's position in the document. If the 'before' gadget is not found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
before - the gadget before which the new gadget is to be inserted.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

insertBefore

void insertBefore(java.lang.String url,
                  Gadget gadget)
Inserts a new gadget immediately before the gadget with the given url. If a gadget with the url is not found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be found.
gadget - the new gadget to be inserted.

replace

void replace(Gadget gadget)
Replaces the contents of the gadget matching the given gadget's url with the contents of the given gadget. If a gadget matching this url is not found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
gadget - the gadget to be found and replaced.

replace

void replace(Gadget toReplace,
             Gadget replaceWith)
Replaces the 'toReplace' gadget with the 'replaceWith' gadget. If the 'toReplace' gadget cannot be found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
toReplace - the gadget to be replaced.
replaceWith - the replacement gadget.

replace

void replace(java.lang.String url,
             Gadget gadget)
Replaces the gadget matching the given url with the given gadget. If the gadget cannot be found, this method has no effect.

Parameters:
url - the url of the gadget to be replaced.
gadget - the replacement gadget.
